sentences.sentence: Instead of slicing horizontally or vertically, we slice radially.
sentences.translation: 取代横向纵向切割的是，我们沿半径切割。

sentences.sentence: And so that energy goes out radially, symmetrically, isotropically in all directions, and so it's very easy.
sentences.translation: 因此能量是呈放射状的，对称的，等效全向的辐射，向各个方向，因此很简单。

sentences.sentence: In some cases, it is actually even making more sense maybe to go radially, start out from the origin to your end point.
sentences.translation: 某些情况下，从原点到终点沿径向走，可能更有意义。
